title: 「ALW#195」发现了我到河.北省来原话（实际上是推荐电影）
author: 莉莉霍瓦特
txt_content:
Yesterday I saw a film called Dawnfall.
And it is wonderful.
It is about World War II.
It has a saying "我到河北省来".
But the original words are "But I conquered all of Europe on my own".


yep,I am watering a passage...

replies.txt_content:
玩梗一波
